data.text:
DISCOVER BONJOUR RATP - All transportation and mobility in Paris and greater Ãle-de-France.

Bonjour RATP is your app that saves you time and simplifies all your daily trips !

âº PURCHASE YOUR NAVIGO PASS OR T+ TICKETS ON BONJOUR RATP AND USE THEM DIRECTLY WITH YOUR IPHONE, APPLE WATCH, OR NAVIGO PASS

Save time! Buy the following tickets* in the app and store them directly on your iPhone or Apple Watch with the Wallet app:

-Navigo Monthly pass (zones 1-5)

-Navigo Weekly pass (zones 1-5)

-Navigo Daily pass (with zone selection)

-T+ ticket booklets (full fare and reduced fare)

-Individual T+ tickets

-Orlybus and Roissybus tickets

-Special fares (Navigo Youth Weekend, Anti-pollution pass...)

You can store and validate your tickets with your iPhone, Apple Watch, or load them onto your Navigo pass.

*Unfortunately, the other tickets are not available at the moment.

âº ALL YOUR TRANSPORT ITINERARIES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

All your trips and journeys in Paris and Ãle-de-France at your fingertips: Bus, Metro, RER, Tramway, Transilien SNCF, VTC Marcel, TIER scooters, LIME and DOTT scooters, VÃ©lib' bikes, LIME and DOTT bikes, as well as Noctilien and Orlyval.

Find, according to your mode of transport, real-time bus schedules, metro schedules, and train schedules, metro and RER maps, itineraries, and disruption alerts on the entire RATP network, as well as many other services.

âº NAVIGATE THROUGHOUT THE PARIS AND ÃLE-DE-FRANCE NETWORK

Select your mode of transport: Bus, Metro, RER, Tramway, Transilien SNCF, Lime bikes and scooters, Dott bikes and scooters, Tier bikes and scooters, VÃ©lib' bikes, as well as Marcel rideshare,

-Check real-time departure times and save your favorites,

-Plan your itineraries and calculate the duration of your trips,

-Filter accessible itineraries in the search tab for reduced mobility,

-Receive alerts in case of disruptions on your favorite lines.

âº ALL SHARED BIKES AND SCOOTERS IN ÃLE-DE-FRANCE DIRECTLY IN THE APP

Find and unlock Lime, Dott, and Tier bikes and scooters around you directly on the Bonjour RATP app !

âº RENT YOUR VÃLIB' IN JUST A FEW CLICKS

Find available VÃ©lib' bikes around you on the BONJOUR RATP app and take a VÃ©lib' with ease !

âº ORDER YOUR RIDES IN REAL TIME

Book your MARCEL rides without switching apps. Save time: book your rides directly from the Bonjour RATP app with our partner Marcel.

âº VIEW REAL-TIME TRAFFIC

Get all the traffic information in real time for your modes of transport: RER, Metro, Bus, Tramway, Transilien.

âº TRAVEL SERENELY

Check the passenger density on your itinerary with the onboard crowding indicator.

âº CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT TO MANAGE ALL YOUR MOBILITIES AND FAVORITES

Save your favorite stations and schedules to receive real-time alerts about the traffic status

Access a single account to book and pay for all your mobilities at any time, from any mobile device

Benefit from personalized offers and participate in improving our services (test features in preview, give us your feedback... all thanks to your single account)

âº ACCESS OFFICIAL RATP AND ÃLE-DE-FRANCE MOBILITÃ MAPS EVEN OFFLINE

-Metro,

-RER,

-Buses and Tramways,

-Noctiliens,

-Transiliens SNCF

For more information about our services, feel free to contact us by email at clients@bonjour-ratp.fr
